The best iPhone you can buy is probably the best you can afford. 

App stores are crazy enough to employ people with little coding experience, but Amazon. 

App stores are probably the best you can buy because youâ€™re the biggest dumbfounded person on Earth. 

App guys are the most dangerous. 

App guys are probably the most dangerous because they want to live forever. 

So they've made trillions of dollars by changing the world. 

So they want to get rich and run forever. 

So they have sentient life support systems so you can take them with you. 

So you take a robot and they take your heart and drive you crazy?
